mapper.insert: insert into department_year_score (year, departmentID, departmentName, yearScore ) values(#{year}, #{departmentID}, #{departmentName}, #{yearScore})
insert into cadre_year_score (year, cadreID, cadreName, rank, departmentName, yearScore) values(#{year}, #{cadreID}, #{cadreName}, #{rank}, #{departmentName}, #{yearScore})
mapper.select: select id, year, departmentID, departmentName, yearScore from department_year_score where year=#{year}
select id, year, cadreID, cadreName, rank, departmentName, yearScore from cadre_year_score where year=#{year}
select id, year, departmentID, departmentName, yearScore from department_year_score where year=#{year} and departmentID=#{departmentID}
select id, year, cadreID, cadreName, rank, departmentName, yearScore from cadre_year_score where year=#{year} and cadreID=#{cadreID}
